page.title: 16Transport
page.content: The people in our area rely on cars as their main means of transport.Every home in our survey had a car.Over half the houses had more than 1 car.83% of all the cars were British ,we thought there would be far more foreign cars. Ford and B.L. were the most common makes.Out of the 36 people in our survey more than 30 people had travelled by air,only 4 had not.There were many fathers who used air transport for their work_quite a few travel by air each week.The people of Ashton do not use trains very much because most people have cars.Only 1 person in the survey used rail regula_ rly and 13 used it sometimes.Again the bus service like the train service was not used regularly at most only 3 people used it often,23 sometimes and 11 never.In Ashton and Manley no one has seen an electric car.
